    • Constructor Detail

      • InsuranceCompany

        public InsuranceCompany(int id,
                        double cap,
                        double pt)
        Simple constructor for insurance companies. The capital must be set by the modeller, while all other values are initiated in zeros (profit, contracts, etc)
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the company (used for the data-export
        cap - Initial capital of the insurance company.
        pt - Profit target

    • Method Detail

      • addInsurance

        public void addInsurance(HealthInsurance healthInsurance)
        Adds the insurance in the argument to the list of insurances of the company. This method is called by the constructor of insurances HealthInsurance#HealthInsurance(InsuranceCompany, Patient, double, double, double, double)
        Parameters:
        healthInsurance - Insurance to be added

      • payReimbursementAndAddValueToLog

        public void payReimbursementAndAddValueToLog(int tick,
                                             Patient insuree,
                                             int hipID,
                                             double reimbursement)
        Carries out the payment of the reimbursement by:
        1. Reducing the capital stock of the insurance company
        2. Adding the amount to the YTD-reimbursement variable
        3. Adding the capital to the capital of the insuree
        Parameters:
        tick - Tick number when the reimbursement is issued
        insuree - Patient to whom the reimbursement is issued
        hipID - ID of the HIPlan under which the reimbursement is issued
        reimbursement - Amount reimbursed

      • checkAcceptInsuree

        public boolean checkAcceptInsuree(Patient patient,
                                  HIPlan plan)
        Method to analyse whether the insurance company accepts the patient as client. The current version simply return a TRUE if the insuree is accepted and FALSE otherwise. The method also checks if the age range for which the plan is designed has been respected.
        Parameters:
        patient - the potential insuree
        plan - Health insurance plan the patient want to contract HIPlan
        Returns:
        true=accept, false=reject

      • computeExpectedHCE

        public double computeExpectedHCE(Patient patient)
        Computes the expected health care expenditure of the individual based on information that is available to the insurance company. There might be similar methods using other information sets.
        Parameters:
        patient - The individual for which we compute the expected health insurance cost.
        Returns:
        double value of expected HCE

      • getPaidPrimeAndAddValueToPrimeLog

        public void getPaidPrimeAndAddValueToPrimeLog(int tick,
                                              int ptID,
                                              int hipID,
                                              double prime)
        This method performs two tasks: 1. It updates the Insurance Company's capital and the primes counter by adding to it a prime paid by an insuree 2. It adds the paid prime to the Insurance Company's primeLog
        Parameters:
        tick - Tick in which the prime is paid
        ptID - The unique ID of the Patient that is paying the prime
        hipID - HIPlan to which the Patient's HealthInsurance belongs
        prime - value of the prime

      • getCapital

        public double getCapital()
        Returns:
        the capital of the insurance company
